The Minnich Collection

description: From fashion periodical (P.15,184.1); a woman in a green and purple gown with a white hat with white plumes and green and purple ribbon and bows
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Plate I from Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Seconde Année, Quatorzième Cahier, 30 Mars 1787
